```{r}
inflation_rates <- fread("kenya_debt/Inflation Rates.csv")
nms_new <- function(df){
    nms_old <- names(df)
    nms_new <- nms_old %>% tolower() 
    nms_new <- gsub("\\s", "_", nms_new)
    nms_new

}
inflation_rates[, date := paste(Year)]
```
